content.rendered:
Directed By R. Balki

Written By R. Balki. Raja Sen. Rishi Virmani

Stars Amitabh Bachchan (Amitabh Bachchan (Third Umpire Film)). Pooja Bhatt (Zenobia Shroff). Sunny Deol (Arvind Mathur). Ranjit Deval (Film Critic). Shreya Dhanwanthary (Nila). Anand Krishnan. Pyarali Nayani (Nitin Shrivastav). Saranya Ponvannan (Nila’s mother). Rajeev Ravindranathan (Srini Shetty). Dulquer Salmaan (Sebastian Gomes). Abhijit Sinha (Reviewer).

Language Hindi

Producer Rakesh Jhunjhunwala. Jayantilal Gada. Anil Naidu. Gauri Shinde

Production Hope Production
